delegation.gemini_usage: Delegate non-Claude-specific tasks to gemini -p for token conservation. Use Playwright for online tasks.

notes.parallelization_detail: Adaptive: orchestrator decides parallel vs sequential per checkpoint, discussed with user before implementing
notes.model_usage: Opus for deep analysis (research, roadmap, complex planning). Sonnet for standard agents. Haiku for lightweight/fast tasks. Mix based on need, not cost.
